changelog:
v2.3 (2026-01-18)
- Auto-detect certificate (.0 file)
- No hardcoded certificate, user uploads their own
- Fixed WebUI module status detection
- Improved SukiSU/KernelSU/APatch compatibility
- Better APEX injection for Android 14+
- Fixed changelog display in SukiSU

v2.2
- Updated CA certificates
- Improved Android compatibility

v2.1
- SukiSU detection
- APEX namespace injection
- WebUI improvements
